dct_title_s: ATLANTIS INSULA à NICOLAO SANSON Antiquitati Restituta; Nunc demum Majori Forma delineata, et in decem REGNA, Iuxta decem Neptuni Filios Distributa. Præterea INSULÆ, NOSTRÆQ CONTINENTIS REGIONES quibus Imperavere ATLANTICI REGES; aut quas Armis Tentavere. ex Conatibus Geographicis
dct_description_sm: Published by Petrum Mariette, as above. "Cum privilegio ad viginti annos Lutetiæ Paristorum. Apud Petrum Mariette via Iacobara sub signo spei, 1669"
ca. 1677. With changed imprint: Apud Autorem.
With changed imprint: reno Cum Privilegio ad Viginti Annos LUTETIÆ PARISIORUM. Apud Autorem in Ædibus Regüs, 1690. 38.3 x 54.7 cm.; 40 x 56.5 cm. including border.

With changed imprint: PATAVJJ Ex Typographia Seminarÿ, Anno 1694. With ASIÆ PARS now labelled. Issued in: Tabulæ Geographicæ, Quibus universa geographia vetus continentur ... -- Typographia Seminary : Padua, 1699.

Six words added to beginning of title, above shading, which continues as Tropicus Capricorni: NOVUS ORBIS potius ALTERA CONTINENS Sive ... ; additional foliage extends cartouche above Tropicus Capricorni; and imprint changed to: LUTETIÆ PARISIORUM. Apud Autorem in Ædibus Regüs, 1699. With ASIA labelled. Also, text in small paragraphs placed throughout map is reformated with no change to content. 38.3 x 54.7 cm.; 40 x 56.5 cm. including border (Athenienses extends to imprint edge).

With changed imprint: AMSTELODAMI Apud PETRUM MORTIER Cum Privilegio. Issued in: Atlas antiquus, sacer, ecclesiasticus et profanus ... / Joannes Clericus [Jean Le Clerc]. -- Amstelodami, Apud Petrum Mortier, [170-?].

With changed imprint: AMSTELODAMI Apud PETRUM MORTIER Cum Privilegio. With ATLANTIS INSULA (top center, outside border) and engraved “87” (lower right, outside border). Issued in: Atlas antiquus, sacer, ecclesiasticus et profanus ... / Joannes Clericus [Jean Le Clerc]. -- Amstelodami, Apud Petrum Mortier, [1705].

With changed imprint: A PARIS Chès le S.ROBERT Geog. du Roi quai de l'Horloge, 1741, otherwise same as State 5: Six words added to beginning of title, above shading, which continues as Tropicus Capricorni: NOVUS ORBIS potius ALTERA CONTINENS Sive ... ; additional foliage extends cartouche above Tropicus Capricorni; With ASIA labelled. Also, text in small paragraphs placed throughout map is reformated with no change to content.

Issued in his: Cartes generales de toutes les parties du monde ... , 1669. Reissued 1690. Issued in his: Cartes generales de la geographie ancienne et nouvelle ... , 1676. Issued in: Atlas antiquus, sacer, ecclesiasticus et profanus ... / Joannes Clericus [Jean Le Clerc]. -- Amstelodami, Apud Petrum Mortier, [1705]. Issued [1721-1730], published in Amsterdam by Covens & Mortier.
LC 3283 & 5628; Tooley 51 & 52; Leighly 95; BN Sanson V D 208 (Fig.137); Nordenskïold Collection, 2, 275(53); Burden 405 (Plate 405).
California on second Sanson model, with indented northern coast; and with no place names.
